mapper.select: SELECT (foo.geomval).val FROM ( SELECT ST_Intersection(ST_Clip(A.cd_rast, QRY.geom, true), QRY.geom) AS geomval FROM wcmc_hef.tem_biodiversidad_riqueza_potencial_especies_fauna_endemica AS A, (select geom from ST_Transform(ST_GeomFromText(#{strPoligonoConsulta,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 4326),32718) as geom) as QRY WHERE ST_Intersects(A.cd_rast, 1, QRY.geom) ) AS foo WHERE (foo.geomval).val IS NOT NULL
